headlines.description: Manchester United's improved run of form ended on Saturday as Bournemouth beat their visitors 1-0 in a rain-drenched game at the Vitality Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United slip to defeat at Bournemouth

headlines.description: Arsenal were pegged back for the third time in six days as under-pressure Unai Emery saw his side draw 1-1 with Wolves.
headlines.shortLinkText: Emery pressure grows as Arsenal draw

headlines.description: Liverpool avoided a first Premier League defeat of the season Saturday with a come-from-behind, 2-1 win over Aston Villa at Villa Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool earn late win over Aston Villa

events.name: Norwich City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Second-half goals by Leandro Trossard and Shane Duffy earned Brighton & Hove Albion a 2-0 home win over struggling Norwich City.
Manchester City survived a scare at home to Southampton as late goals from Sergio Aguero and Kyle Walker earned them a 2-1 victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City survive scare to edge Saints 2-1

headlines.description: Two first-half goals from John Lundstram helped Sheffield United to an emphatic 3-0 victory over Burnley at Bramall Lane on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Blades cut Burnley down to size with Lundstram double

events.name: Newcastle United at West Ham United

headlines.description: Newcastle United eased their Premier League relegation woes after goals from Ciaran Clark, Federico Fernandez and Jonjo Shelvey.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle edge West Ham to move out of danger zone

headlines.description: Tammy Abraham scored early and Christian Pulisic continued his hot streak with a second-half goal as Chelsea held off Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic strikes again as Chelsea beat Watford
